Pre-Game Insights: Anthony Davis scored 40 points in the Lakers' 120-115 win over the San Antonio Spurs.
The Pelicans are 2-5 against Western Conference opponents.
The Lakers are 5-2 in conference matchups.
The Lakers are third in the Western Conference scoring 52.7 points per game in the paint led by Davis averaging 17.6.
The Pelicans score 105.1 points per game, 12.2 fewer points than the 117.3 the Lakers allow.
The Lakers average 117.8 points per game, 3.8 more than the 114.0 the Pelicans give up to opponents.
Yves Missi is shooting 53.7% and averaging 6.8 points for the Pelicans.
LeBron James is averaging 23.5 points, 8.8 rebounds and 9.6 assists for the Lakers.
The Pelicans have multiple players out including Zion Williamson, CJ McCollum, Herbert Jones, Dejounte Murray, Jose Alvarado, and Jordan Hawkins.
The Lakers have multiple players day-to-day including Jaxson Hayes, Jalen Hood-Schifino, Rui Hachimura, and Jarred Vanderbilt, and Christian Wood is out.
